content: If a factory produces 250 units of product A every day, how many units will it produce in a year, assuming it operates 365 days?

If a factory produces 250 units of product A every day and operates 365 days a year, then the total annual production would be:

250 units/day * 365 days/year = 91,250 units/year

So, the factory will produce 91,250 units of product A in a year.
